chat.content:
A: Type
empty: A
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
============================
forall t : pbtree, ulist (all_pbleaves t) -> distinct_pbleaves t

Related definitions and lemmas:
all_pbleaves = fix all_pbleaves (t : pbtree) : list A := match t with | pbleaf a => a :: nil | pbleft t1 | pbright t1 => all_pbleaves t1 | pbnode t1 t2 => all_pbleaves t1 ++ all_pbleaves t2 end : pbtree -> list A
Inductive pbtree : Type := pbleaf : A -> pbtree | pbleft : pbtree -> pbtree | pbright : pbtree -> pbtree | pbnode : pbtree -> pbtree -> pbtree
distinct_pbleaves = fun t : pbtree => forall t0 t1 t2 : pbtree, inpb (pbnode t1 t2) t -> inpb t0 t1 -> inpb t0 t2 -> False : pbtree -> Prop
ulist : forall A : Type, list A -> Prop
distinct_pbleaves_pbright : forall t : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves t -> distinct_pbleaves (pbright t)
distinct_pbleaves_pbleft : forall t : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves t -> distinct_pbleaves (pbleft t)
pb_unique_key : forall t : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves t -> unique_key (compute_pbcode t)
pb_unique_prefix : forall t : pbtree, distinct_pbleaves t -> unique_prefix (compute_pbcode t)
pbtree_dec : forall a b : pbtree, {a = b} + {a <> b}
btree_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a b : btree A, {a = b} + {a <> b}
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}
weight_tree_compute : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list A) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> (forall a : A, f a = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a m) -> length (encode eqA_dec (compute_code t) m) = weight_tree f t
all_pbleaves_inpb : forall (t : pbtree) (a : A), In a (all_pbleaves t) -> inpb (pbleaf a) t
all_pbleaves_in : forall (t : pbtree) (a : A), inpb (pbleaf a) t -> In a (all_pbleaves t)
distinct_leaves_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a : btree A, {distinct_leaves a} + {~ distinct_leaves a}
number_of_occurrences : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list A -> nat
inb_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall a p : btree A, {inb a p} + {~ inb a p}
weight : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> nat
find_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> code A -> list bool
restrict_code : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> code A -> code A
encode : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> code A -> list A -> list bool
frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> list A -> list (A * nat)
frequency_list_unique : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A), unique_key (frequency_list eqA_dec l)
number_of_occurrences_O : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l = 0
add_frequency_list : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> A -> list (A * nat) -> list (A * nat)
in_alphabet_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (m : list A) (c : code A), {in_alphabet m c} + {~ in_alphabet m c}
add_frequency_list_not_in : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (m : list (A * nat)) (a b : A) (n : nat), a <> b -> In (a, n) m -> In (a, n) (add_frequency_list eqA_dec b m)
add_frequency_list_unique_key : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (a : A) (l : list (A * nat)), unique_key l -> unique_key (add_frequency_list eqA_dec a l)
in_frequency_map : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a l -> In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l))
in_frequency_map_inv : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l : list A) (a : A), In a (map fst (frequency_list eqA_dec l)) -> In a l
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}
all_leaves_ulist : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A), distinct_leaves t -> ulist (all_leaves t)
all_leaves_unique : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A), ulist (all_leaves t) -> distinct_leaves t
correct_encoding : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (c : code A), unique_prefix c -> not_null c -> forall m : list A, in_alphabet m c -> decode c (encode eqA_dec c m) = m

```intros t H. induction t.
- intros _. simpl. constructor.
- simpl. intros [H1 | H1].
  + subst. constructor.
  + apply H in H1. apply distinct_pbleaves_pbleft. assumption.
- simpl. intros [H1 | [H1 | H1]].
  + subst. constructor.
  + apply H in H1. apply distinct_pbleaves_pbleft. assumption.
  + apply H in H1. apply distinct_pbleaves_pbright. assumption.
- simpl. intros [H1 | H1].
  + subst. constructor.
  + apply H in H1. apply distinct_pbleaves_pbright. assumption.
```

original: intros t H. induction t. - intros _. simpl. constructor. - simpl. intros [H1 | H1]. + subst. constructor. + apply H in H1. apply distinct_pbleaves_pbleft. auto. - simpl. intros [H1 | [H1 | H1]]. + subst. constructor. + apply H in H1. apply distinct_pbleaves_pbleft. auto. + apply H in H1. apply distinct_pbleaves_pbright. auto. - simpl. intros [H1 | H1]. + subst. constructor. + apply H in H1. apply distinct_pbleaves_pbright. auto.
